name: Salsamole!!
author: mpace_20
summary: This salsa is tried and true. I developed it over a number of years and I always get compliments when I make it. Warning:  Salsamole is addicting! Sometimes I like it chunky and sometimes I make it smoother. Enjoy!
ingredients: 3  jalapeno peppers, minced, or to taste
2  serrano peppers, minced, or to taste  (Optional)
1  habanero pepper, minced, or to taste  (Optional)
3 cloves garlic, minced, or to taste
1 tablespoon olive oil, or to taste
directions: Combine the jalapeno peppers, serrano peppers, habanero pepper, onion, garlic, avocados, Roma tomatoes, diced tomatoes, and lemon juice into a food processor
Drizzle in the olive oil; season to taste with salt and pepper
Pulse until the salsamole has reached your desired consistency
